 * The base border styles for the Argon Dashboard 2 MUI.
 * You can add new border width, border color or border radius using this file.
 * You can customized the borders value for the entire Argon Dashboard 2 MUI using thie file.
 */// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI Base Styles
import colors from"assets/theme-dark/base/colors";// Argon Dashboard 2 MUI Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem";import rgba from"assets/theme-dark/functions/rgba";const{white}=colors;const borders={borderColor:rgba(white.main,0.15),borderWidth:{0:0,1:pxToRem(1),2:pxToRem(2),3:pxToRem(3),4:pxToRem(4),5:pxToRem(5)},borderRadius:{xs:pxToRem(2),sm:pxToRem(4),md:pxToRem(8),lg:pxToRem(12),xl:pxToRem(16),xxl:pxToRem(24),section:pxToRem(160)}};export default borders;
